previews.title: Youtuber & Vloggers
previews.subtitle: Version 01
previews.desc: This version was created having in mind everything you may need if you are a Youtuber or Vlogger. From featured videos and video spotlights (like the one in the footer and the header videos slider), to a subscribers live count and a super complete shop to sell merchandise.

previews.title: Youtuber & Vloggers
previews.subtitle: Version 02
previews.desc: This version was created for Youtubers or Vloggers that wanna have a simpler website to showcase their videos and/or sell their merchandise. With a bigger slider on the homepage, an affiliates page to monetize the site’s traffic and many more features!

previews.title: Gamer & Streamer
previews.subtitle: Version 01
previews.desc: This version was created having in mind everything you may need if you are a Gamer or Streamer. From upcoming stream countdowns, top games spotlight and livestream boxes, to a stream clips feed and a super complete shop.

previews.title: Gamer & Streamer
previews.subtitle: Version 02
previews.desc: This version was created for Gamers or Streamers that wanna have a simpler website to showcase their stream and/or sell their merchandise. With a subscribe button on top, an affiliates page and gear showcase to monetize the site’s traffic and many more features!

features.title: Tailwind CSS
features.desc: The template is made on top of Tailwind CSS 3.3.x a utility-first CSS framework that can be composed to build any design, directly in your markup.

features.title: 4 Main Demos
features.desc: We created 4 demos, 2 for Vloggers and 2 for Streamers so you can easily choose the one that you like the most or fits you better!

features.title: Light and Dark
features.desc: Each version comes in two colors light and dark. Select which version is the best for you or leave the select option for your users!

features.title: Developers Ready
features.desc: We created the template based on concepts of templates, pages, and partials - powered by Handlebars templating language.

features.title: Well Documented
features.desc: We created an online documentation and quick walkthroughs so you can easily do everything! From initial setup to customizing and more!

features.title: Support & Updates
features.desc: With the purchase you get 6 or 12-month support and lifetime updates! Once purchased you get all future updates!
